entry.value: Congrats you have completed your workout.Book another class and stayfit.

Under each plan, there are limits to the number of times you can visit each gym. Check below for the number of time you can visit a gym per plan. Once the limit is reached, you may still visit your favorite gym by purchasing a single visit pass.

[{"name":"XEINA", "message_ar": "", "message_eng":"I love how P5M now includes the option of booking classes with friends."},{"name":"RANA", "message_ar": "", "message_eng":"Great way to try out new gyms & classes and decide where you wanna go."}]
On P5M you can visit multiple gyms and do multiple activities using 1 membership ONLY!
With the P5M membership you can:
With the P5M membership you can visit a swimming class today, crossfit tomorrow and yoga on the weekend. Each class at a different gym.
Go to a different gym for every workout if you want!
If you generally purchase a single entry pass to a gym, you would save 40% by getting a package.Pay 30KWD for 5 classes instead of 50KWD!
Book and pay for your workout at night, in the morning or on route to class. Don\'t wait on the phone or worry about your confirmation.
Go to a different gym for every workout if you want!
Choose the number of classes that suits you, and use your classes at all the gyms on board.

Workout any gym
you want,anytime
you want, while 
saving money
Every time you renew your P5M plan! Helping you get fit & stay fit!

[{"text_en": ""Explore and join fitness classes around you with one plan."", "text_ar": "استكشف وانضم للكلاسات الرياضية التي حولك بدون الحاجة لاشتراك", "image": "https://d15r6mjl4pq1lw.cloudfront.net/gymgallery/0af557e0-eec5-4223-93dc-cb9c9e84ce29.png"}, {"text_en": "Discover new trainers and studios that cater to your fitness needs.", "text_ar”: "استكشف مدربين جدد ونوادي تلبي متطلبات لياقتك البدنية", "image": "https://d15r6mjl4pq1lw.cloudfront.net/gymgallery/654f945e-3a00-4d01-aeb5-0b65a7abce56.png"}, {"text_en": "Filter classes based on location, time and activity to find your perfect workout.", "text_ar": "قم بعمل فلتر للمواقع والأوقات والنشاطات للعثور على التمرين المناسب لك", "image": "https://d15r6mjl4pq1lw.cloudfront.net/gymgallery/bf51a873-8a3b-4762-9e7b-314740e1cf60.png"}, {"text_en": "I don’t know where to start” Is no longer an excuse.", "text_ar": "'لا أدري أين أبدأ' لم يعد عذرا بعد اليوم", "image": "https://d15r6mjl4pq1lw.cloudfront.net/gymgallery/41cc5590-3a44-4cc7-9b38-448c96403030.png”}]

Join one of P5M's online workouts at anytime and anywhere.

The payment will be done in Kuwait Dinar. Rate of conversion: 1KD = $3.3
